segments.text: John , if you don't mind , I'd like to ask you a personal question .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To tell you the truth , I'm not married . I'm still single .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then , when do you plan to get married ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know.It ' s still up in tha air .
segments.speaker: S2
